ygData.subject: Re: RE: Hey this sounded interesting.. *Time to KABOING ??*
ygData.msgSnippet: After a night out drinking with some old friends, I crawled back to my computer, popped online, and loaded up EQ. I m in Easht Karana?  Hmmm.... I wonder what
ygData.messageBody:
After a night out drinking with some old friends, I crawled back to my
computer, popped online, and loaded up EQ.
"I'm in Easht Karana? Hmmm.... I wonder what Broon consh for now?"
I conned him... blue at 27.
/shout "Broon! Ye pixeltated piece of orc-lickin' crap! Get ready to
die before me!"
Reverse-kited (Screech-Chains) him until he was almost dead (I was only half
a bubble of hps down from full), so I decided to stop and melee him down.
Big mistake. Luckily I drunkenly changed tactics back to reverse-kite and
beat him while still having a bubble of hp left.
Did I say I love Screech?

-=B=-
27 on The Rathe
